game.name: Golden Steam
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Stereo Sound, Subtitle Options, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Golden Steam is a thrilling arcade-puzzle adventure where you collect Golden Steams and activate machine parts to recover artifacts scattered through fractured time. Navigate 10 worlds, master geometric rotations, and control time itself in a steampunk sci-fi universe where every second counts.
